icpDefinition.quickDecisionMaking: C-level executives who can make purchasing decisions within 30 days
icpDefinition.prioritizedRequirements: Real-time observability, cost optimization, and developer productivity
icpDefinition.implementationReadiness: DevOps teams with existing microservices architecture
icpDefinition.firmographic: SaaS companies with 50-500 employees and $10M-$100M ARR
icpDefinition.technographic: Using Kubernetes, AWS/GCP, and modern application stacks
icpDefinition.behavioral: Proactive about system reliability and willing to invest in monitoring tools
